overview: This is the story of the Fire Goddess Pele and the dynamics of her relationship with her sister Hiâ€™iaka. Six years ago, the renowned dance company Halau 'O Kekuhi began the ambitious undertaking of assembling and recreating the legend for modern audiences, translating it to the contemporary stage by combining the traditions of Hawaiian chant and hula with innovative elements of Western theater.
title: Holo Mai Pele
